definition: to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: As potential applicants have noted, it takes time and energy to prepare for the examination.
sentences.chinese: 一些報考的學生說，考研既費時間又耗精力。

sentences.english: The main contradiction of preparing for postgraduate examination and internship is time conflict.
sentences.chinese: 考研與實習的矛盾主要是時間衝突的矛盾。

sentences.english: Here are five timeless management laws that have stood the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是能經受時間考研的五條永恆的管理法則。

sentences.english: What school applied chemistry Kaoyan quite good?
sentences.chinese: 應用化學專業考研哪些學校比較不錯？

sentences.english: An idle brain is the devil's workshop.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢的頭腦是魔鬼的旅遊管理考研工廠。

sentences.english: Why you think it was a big problem to you?
sentences.chinese: 臨着一個重要的選擇，是工作，保研，還是考研。

sentences.english: Now, like many of her colleagues, the 29-year-old is applying to graduate school.
sentences.chinese: 如今，29歲的帕明特瑞和她許多同事一樣正在考研。

sentences.english: Whether one wants to become a postgraduate or look for a job largely depends on one's personal interests.
sentences.chinese: 考研還是找工作，這主要取決於一個人的興趣所在。

sentences.english: Next, I would like to say that they PubMed reasons.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，我想說說自己考研的原因。

sentences.english: Who is these are taken an examination of grind the management department of the class, this is limitted very hard also at present.
sentences.chinese: 誰是這些考研班的管理部門，這個目前也很難界定。

sentences.english: I have to attend training courses for Graduate School Entrance Exams.
Hu said most of the school-drifters aim to enter grad school.
sentences.chinese: 胡教授說，大多數的校漂人都想考研。

sentences.english: Hu said most of the school-drifters aim to enter grad school.
sentences.chinese: 胡教授說，大部分“校漂一族”都打算考研。

sentences.english: Week-long classes during the National Day holiday will help you to consolidate the key knowledge points.
sentences.chinese: 國慶長假七天的考研班也可以幫助鞏固知識要點。

sentences.english: Allow me to introduce to you Mr. Zhang Lei.
sentences.chinese: 請允許我武漢文都考研向你介紹張雷先生。

sentences.english: This book is called of jurisprudence one's deceased father grind " red treasured book " .
sentences.chinese: 本書被稱爲法理學的考研“紅寶書”。

definition: to recommend sb for postgraduate studies/to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to return to the same school and repeat a course from which one has already graduated, as a result of failing to get good enough results to progress to one's desired higher-level school
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to sit for the second round of a two-stage exam
